m2:
*!joke*	:	tells a joke

*!sticker*	:	converts image into stickers
@mention someone (ask then to save the bots number)
*!all*	:	 mention all   --works only in groups


*ADMIN COMMANDS* --works only in groups

*!add <phoneno>*		:	adds the number to the group

*!remove @mention*	:	removes mentioned people

*!promote @mention*	:	promotes mentioned people

*!demote @mention*	:	demotes mentioned people
